about_the_game:
A delightful game in the classic brick breaker genre. Defend blocks in immersive 3D environments, skillfully dodge hazards, and strategically break through bricks to progress. With a fresh twist on familiar gameplay, each level presents new challenges, dynamic obstacles, and powerful upgrades to help you conquer every brick-filled stage.

Featuring vibrant 3D visuals, smooth controls, and engaging mechanics, Bricks Over Blocks delivers a modern take on the brick-breaking experience. Whether you’re chasing high scores or trying to keep your head above lava, this game will keep you engaged with its dynamic gameplay and escalating difficulty. Do you have what it takes to smash through the bricks and complete the challenge?

Features:

  • 3D platforming combined with classic brick-breaking mechanics

  • Challenging levels with a variety of hazards and power-ups

  • Beautiful 3D environments and engaging sound design

  • Smooth controls and responsive gameplay

  • Multiple levels with increasing difficulty to keep you hooked

Start your brick-breaking adventure in Bricks Over Blocks today!

name: Bricks Over Blocks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: m System Requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card or integrated sound
  • Additional Notes: 720p resolution, 60 FPS with low settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K / AMD Ryzen 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card or integrated sound with surround sound support
  • Additional Notes: 1080p resolution, 60 FPS with high settings

short_description: Bricks Over Blocks is a fast-paced 3D side-scroller blending platforming with brick-breaking mechanics. Smash bricks, dodge hazards, defend the blocks underfoot, and use power-ups to conquer challenging levels. It’s a fresh take on a classic genre. Are you ready to break through?
